topic.title: Additional Framework Plugin Extension
topic.shortdesc: This type of plugin allows you to add a new framework straight from the plugin.

body.p: To specify additional frameworks, edit the plugin descriptor and add extension elements that point to them, as in the following example:<extension type="AdditionalFrameworks" path="framework_directory"/>

The path attribute should be a sub-directory of the plugin. If the plugin is installed as an add-on, the new framework will be set as read-only and editing it will only be possible if you duplicate it. If the plugin is installed in the /plugins directory, the new frameworks will be editable.
